$description:
| What does this do? | Retains chat and channel message data in Microsoft Teams for 365 days before allowing deletion. The default is 365 days, should be updated to meet retention needs of organization. |
| Why should you use this? | Satisfies organizational, legal, or regulatory retention requirements for Teams communications. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Teams data cannot be permanently deleted within the retention period. |
